runs.comm: a short ball fired in from round the wicket, it climbs on Tamim and he ducks to let it pass
Tamim jumps down to a short ball and slashes hard towards point where the ball bursts through the fielders hands, skidding across the dewy turf
nudged off the pads towards midwicket for a single
Anamul ducks but the ball doesn't rise, luckily for the batsman the line was outside off, else it might have hit his helmet
that's too short and Anamul has swivelled and played a cracking pull, flat, fast and flying over the head of the leaping fielder on the deep square leg boundary
short and wide outside off, Anamul stands in his crease and sends the ball racing in front of point with a crisp cut
worked off the pads towards square leg
played back to the bowler on the back foot
pitching on leg from round the wicket, Anamul stays in his crease and plays to midwicket
nudged down the ground for a single to long on
Tamim leans forward and works the ball towards square leg
worked off the pads once again in front of square leg
short once again and Anamul is up for it, and how! He pulls with style, getting under it and sending the ball flying over the fielder on the square leg boundary
flicked off the pads to the fielder in the circle behind square
a full ball from round the wicket, driven firmly to mid-on, Tamim wanted one but Anamul sent him back
a full ball and a slower one, nudged towards midwicket where the fielder got the throw away quickly, Anamul put in a spectacular dive to make his ground
played with an open face behind point
an appeal for lbw but that pitched far outside leg stump
well placed, Tamim goes back and opens the face to play the square drive between two fielders in the point region
defended from the crease towards the bowler
steps out of his crease and pads it away on the off side, a half-hearted attempt to defend
played towards cover from the crease
worked off the pads through square for a single
strays down leg side, Tamim leans forward and across to nudge the ball delicately towards fine leg
defended on the off side
a bit too short, but Anamul mis-times it on the off side
pitches outside off stump and skids on to the right-hander, Anamul mis-times towards the bowler

Anamul goes back and towards leg and even though he has no room he manages to punch the ball in the air and clear the fielder at mid-off, once it hits the grass though it races across the dewy outfield to the boundary
defended on the off side
too short and wide outside off stump, Anamul cuts hard and beats the in field in front of point
nudged off the front foot towards the leg side for a single
defended from the crease
played off the back foot towards mid off
there's a long on in place but Tamim doesn't care, he charges and takes on the fielder and even though he doesn't make perfect contact he manages to clear the boundary
played from the crease on the off side
Tamim skips out of his crease once again and launches the ball flat over the fielder at mid-off with a powerful drive
good length on off and middle, blocked close on the off side for a single
Tamim doesn't have much room but he manages to get the ball away through point with a whippy cut, the fielder dives full length on the boundary to save the four
Tamim tries to drive from the crease on the up through the off side but he gets beaten by the extra bounce from a length
short of a length with width outside off, Tamim cuts it hard through cover point to the fielder in the deep
worked off the pads through square leg
a length ball on the pads, flicked from the crease through square leg
bowled full across the left-hander from round the wicket, nudged off the front foot on the off side for  a single
not much room to work with, Anamul goes back and muscles the ball towards long on for another single
Tamim charges and frees his arms, this time he mis-times the ball, connecting with the bottom of the bat and it drops well short of long off
Tamim goes back to cut but is beaten by a flatter one outside off

caught at short third man! Tamim charged again and slogged, aiming for the stands. He wasn't to the pitch of the ball, not by a long way, and the ball lobbed into Sagar Pun's hands off the outside edge
defended on the front foot on the leg side
played with soft hands close on the off side for a single
good length outside off stump, defended from the crease towards point
Rahman's off the mark with a statement! He jumps out of the crease to a short of a length ball and smashes it with a flat bat past the fielder at mid-on
a full ball outside off stump, driven towards cover for a single
good length around off stump, defended from the crease with a straight bat
too short, and with width outside off, Anamul waits for it and then cuts hard, the ball beats point and screams across the wet grass
tries to work the ball off the pads but misses and collects a leg bye on the off side, an appeal from the bowler from lbw but that was missing leg stump
defended on the front foot towards the leg side, the bowler slowed the pace down nicely
defended from the crease with a straight bat, a wicket to wicket line from the bowler
nudged off the pads behind square leg
tossed up nearly into the blockhole, defended from the crease on the leg side
steps out of his crease and defends once he isn't to the pitch of the ball
Anamul's made room to hit the ball on the off side and he ended up slapping the ball in the air but wide of the man at cover, he hit that very hard

there's a run out! The fielder at point does superbly. Anamul had cut the ball hard towards point, where the man dived to his right and brought down the ball. He recovered quickly and threw to the keeper's end. Anamul had sprinted for the single right away but his partner did not respond. Both batsmen were virtually level at the bowler's end of the pitch when the bails were broken by the keeper, and it is Anamul who has to go
Shakib tries to scoop his first ball! And I think he scooped it on to the visor of his helmet
Shakib attempts the scoop again and this time his visor is not in the way and he manages to get off the mark with a couple
Shakib closes the face early, playing for the turn, the leading edge falls short of the man at cover
Shakib gets down on one knee and attempts a slog sweep, he misses and is hit on the pad
Shabbir gets down on one knee and sweeps hard, making good contact to send the ball towards deep square leg
defended back to the bowler from the crease
Shakib slogs and mistimes the ball in front of square leg
Shabbir steps out of his crease but isn't to the pitch of the ball, he defends back to the bowler
pushed towards extra cover off the back foot for a single
Shakib mows the ball over the wide long-on boundary with a powerful, full swing of the arms. He jumped out of his crease, got to the pitch of the ball, and hit it right out of the middle
driven off the front foot to midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, driven on the front foot to long off
Shakib moves far outside leg stump to drive the ball from round the wicket inside out through the off side
Shabbir slogs the ball from far outside off stump, mis-timing it though midwicket
driven to long on for another single
steps out and drives the ball hard towards long-on
beaten outside the off stump by one that skids on across the right-hander
Shabbir charges and slogs, makes no proper contact and gets a bottom edge
Shakib steps out this time and thumps the ball to long-on
Shabbir sweeps and gets a top edge that swirls in the air in the direction of short fine leg, the fielder Shakti makes a mess of it and dives in vain in the end
Shakib takes two steps out again and clubs the ball towards long-on
cut late off the back foot behind point
Shakib steps out once again and drives the ball firmly between the bowler at the non-striker, he gets only one though
that's a huge hit, it's in the stands. The length and line allowed Sabbir to free his arms and smash the ball into the stands beyond midwicket
bowled slower and wider outside off, Sabbir reaches for it and plays the ball towards point
Shakib goes the distance now, stepping out and slogging the ball high and far over deep midwicket. Bangladesh finishing this in a hurry
a full toss and Shakib has smashed it over the deep midwicket boundary, only six needed now. 20 off the over so far ...
Shakib goes back and pulls the ball towards the fielder at deep square leg
Shakib levels the score with a powerful straight drive, came forward and hit it hard and flat towards long on
that kept so low and Shakib was good enough to keep it out, he refuses the single! The run was there for the taking but he evidently wants to hit a big one
and he's done it, I'm not sure I like what Shakib did there but what do I know! He ends the game by heaving one over the long-on boundary ... Bangladesh win with 27 balls to spare
